unnormalised: Hey guys, choosing a payment gateway is such a headache! I remember when I was setting up my mom's saree business online.
normalised: Hey guys, choosing a payment gateway is such a headache! I remember when I was setting up my mom's saree business online.

unnormalised: We looked at so many options! Finally went with Razorpay.
normalised: We looked at so many options! Finally went with R A Z O R P A Y.

unnormalised: Anyone else tried them? It's like choosing between mithai during Diwali!
normalised: Anyone else tried them? It's like choosing between mithai during Diwali!

unnormalised: My cousin, Priya, who works at IIT Bombay, recommended it.
normalised: My cousin, Priya, who works at I I T Bombay, recommended it.

unnormalised: It's been pretty good so far, no major "Deewar" level problems!
normalised: It's been pretty good so far, no major "Deewar" level problems!
